widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

description: My name is Ana Lucía, I'm 21 years old, and I'm from Saltillo, Coahuila. I'm studying Computer Systems Engineering, with a specialty in Internet of Things at Instituto Tecnológico de Saltillo. I am a creative person and a technology enthusiast. I love to find out how things work and how to improve them. I enjoy listening to music, dancing, watching movies, and making crafts. I'm so excited to be part of the Justia team, and I expect to learn a lot. I am looking forward to upcoming challenges!

Hi! I'm Rafael, I'm 24 years old, and I'm from Ensenada, Baja California. I'm a Master in Computer Sciences graduate from CICESE. I like to learn about new technologies, develop, and create. I'm young and inexperienced, and I want to know how the world works. I like to think that something big is out there; that's why I wanted to join Justia. I play ping pong and volleyball in my free time, join local tournaments just for fun, and when I can't, I like to play video games like League of Legends, Smash, Breath of the Wild, and many more.
